mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `med`.`order` (`receivable_amount`, `paid_amount`, `cost_amount`, `gross_profit`, `tax`, `reduceTaxAmount`, `sell_details`, `create_time`, `op_user`) VALUES (#{ orderForm.receivableAmount}, #{ orderForm.paidAmount}, #{ orderForm.costAmount}, #{ orderForm.grossProfit}, #{ orderForm.tax}, #{ orderForm.reduceTaxAmount}, #{ orderForm.sellDetails}, now(),#{ orderForm.opUser});
